bottomLinks.title: Tekjusagan - Public Data on Living Standards

gdpr.title: You own your data
gdpr.info: We need to collect information about your cars for you to be able to use the service
gdpr.checkbox: I agree that the above information maybe be applied in the processing of the application together with the information entered in the process of recycling my car.

error.message: We have problem with the connection to the database and cannot save your preferences, please try to re-load the page.

info.noCarsAvailable: We cannot find any cars registered to you.

tooltip.text: A car cannot be recycled if it still has loans, if the car has been reported as stolen or if it has been seized by the police. Login to see more information at

error.message: We have problem with the connection to the database and cannot show your cars, please try to re-load the page.

recycle.title: Recycle car

subTitles.confirm: Do you want select this car for recycling?

recycle.info: Adding your car for recycling which will allow you to recycle it at any of our connected recycling companies. This is not binding and the car will only be recycled if you hand over the car to a recycling company.

confirm.title: Confirm car recycling

subTitles.confirm: Are you sure you want to recycle this car?

confirm.info: By confirming your car will be marked as recyclable. This is not binding, and the car will only be recycled if you hand over the car to a recycling company.

titles.error: We couldn’t mark your car for recycling

handover.info: The car has been successfully confirmed for recycling and is now ready to be handed over to a recycling company.

subTitles.nextStep: Next step: Handover the car to recycling company

handover.subInfo: Handover the car to any of the recycling companies below. Some recycling companies offers pick up, see their website or contact them directly for opening hours and details. Once the car has been handed over for recycling you will receive your payment within 2 business days.

error.title: There were some technical problems
error.message: We ran into a problem marking your car for recycling. Please try again.

titles.info: Cancel the recycling process for this car

cancelModal.info: When you cancel the recycling the car cannot be recycled at the recycling companies until you mark it for recycling again. You can simply redo the process if change your mind.

error.title: There were some technical problems
error.message: We ran into a problem canceling your car. Please try again.

info.oldDeregistration: The car has been successfully recycled, there is no more action needed.
info.payment: Money will be payed by Fjársýsla ríkisins to your state collector within 2 days of the payment has been initiated. You will find your payment

confirmedBy.fund: Car payment inititated by Fjársýsla ríkisins

error.title: There were some technical problems
error.message: We ran into a problem getting information about your car. Please try again later.

deregisterOverview.title: Deregister car
deregisterOverview.info: This process will deregister the car and initiate the payment to car owner and  allow for your company to start the recycling process of the car.

companyInfo.title: Company information
companyInfo.info: The company information will help your customers find and contact you when using the digital car recycling service on island.is.
companyInfo.empty: Add your companies locations so that the users can find your company on iceland.is.

select.title: Select car
select.info: Enter the registration number to the car that you want to deregister. Only cars confirmed by the owner/owners on island.is can be deregistered.

errors.empty: Please enter a car registration number
errors.invalidRegNumber: Please enter registration number in a valid format

info.success: Confirm car for deregistration. This process cannot be undone.
info.error: We couldn’t find any car with that registration number
info.notfound: This can be because the owner has not marked it for recycling at

error.title: There were some technical problems
error.message: We ran into a problem marking the car for deregistration. Please try again.

currentMileage.label: Current mileage

rules.validate: Current mileage is lower then registered mileage

currentMileage.info: Recycling companies are required to register the current mileage of the car when it is handed over for recycling.

info.title: The vehicle is registered out of use at the Icelandic Transport Authority.
info.message: The number plates are deposited at the Icelandic Transport Authority

warning.title: The vehicle is registered out of use with a sticker at the Icelandic Transport Authority.
warning.message: The number plates must accompany the vehicle

numberplate.count: Number of license plates returned with the vehicle
numberplate.missingInfo: If the number plates are found, they must be returned to the Icelandic Transport Authority

recyclingFundOverview.title: Recycled cars
recyclingFundOverview.info: Here is the list of all deregistered vehicles, along with date of the registration.

recyclingCompanies.title: Recycling companies
recyclingCompanies.info: The company information will help your customers contact you when using the digital car recycling service.
recyclingCompanies.empty: There is no recycling comapany added yet

view.title: Recycling company
view.info: You can either update or edit a recycling company. Please verify that the companies information is correct

add.title: Add recycling company
add.info: Adding a new recycling company will make it available to access control. Please verify that the companies information is correct.

accessControl.title: Access control
accessControl.info: Here's a list of all accesses you've given. You can give, edit, and/or remove access.

subtitles.add: An access holder will get access to perform actions based on his/her role. Please be certain that the national id matches the person you want to give access to
subtitles.edit: An access holder will get access to perform actions based on his/her role. Please be certain that the role applies to this person.
subtitles.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this access?

rules.validate: Recycling location could not extend 32 characters

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: You do not have the required permissions to view this page. Please contact the website administrator for further assistance.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.message: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for. Something has gone wrong or you've entered a wrong URL.

view.title: Municipality
view.info: You can update the municipality. Please confirm that the information are correct.

add.title: Add municipality
add.info: Adding a new municipality will make it available to access control. Please verify that the municipality information is correct.
